Uses of Class
jbt.model.task.decorator.ModelDecorator

Packages that use ModelDecorator
jbt.model.task.decorator   
 

Uses of ModelDecorator in jbt.model.task.decorator
 

Subclasses of ModelDecorator in jbt.model.task.decorator
 class ModelHierarchicalContextManager
          A ModelHierarchicalContextManager is a decorator that creates a new context for its child task.
 class ModelInterrupter
          An ModelInterrupter is a decorator that controls the termination of a child task.
 class ModelInverter
          ModelInverter is a decorator used to invert the status code returned by its child.
 class ModelLimit
          Limit is a decorator that limits the number of times a task can be executed.
 class ModelRepeat
          ModelRepeat represents a decorator that runs its child task forever.
 class ModelSafeContextManager
          A ModelSafeContextManager is a decorator that creates a new context for its child task.
 class ModelSafeOutputContextManager
          A ModelSafeOutputContextManager is a decorator that creates a new context for its child task.
 class ModelSucceeder
          A ModelSucceeder is a decorator that makes its child succeeds no matter it it actually fails.
 class ModelUntilFail
          The ModelUntilFail class represents a decorator used to run a task as long as it does not fail.
